articles.description: Ben Stokes’ first five-wicket haul in eight years and a dizzying opening partnership give England much the better of the second day of the fourth Test against India.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes, Zak Crawley and Ben Duckett shine at Old Trafford

articles.description: England manager Sarina Wiegman is "not for sale at any price", says the Football Association chief executive officer Mark Bullingham.
articles.title: Sarina Wiegman 'not for sale at any price' after Euro 2025

articles.description: Newcastle have not named striker Alexander Isak in their squad for a pre-season tour of Asia.

articles.description: England face India in the fourth Test at Old Trafford - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India cricket LIVE: Fourth Test, day two - scores, radio, highlights & updates

articles.description: Cristhian Mosquera is set to join up with Arsenal's pre-season tour in Singapore after completing his transfer from Valencia.

articles.description: Garry Ringrose's withdrawal from the British and Irish Lions team to face Australia shows how seriously current players take concussion, says former wing Ugo Monye.
articles.title: Australia v British and Irish Lions: Garry Ringrose decision shows concussion focus - Ugo Monye

articles.description: Max Verstappen says Christian Horner's removal as Red Bull team principal has no impact on the decision about his own future.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen says his Red Bull future not impacted by Christian Horner's exit

articles.description: Undisputed heavyweight champion Oleksandr Usyk ordered by the WBO to begin negotiations with mandatory challenger Joseph Parker.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk: WBO orders undisputed champion to face Joseph Parker

articles.description: Spanish football expert Andy West looks at how Marcus Rashford's loan move from Manchester United to Barcelona has been received in Spain.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: What's the reaction in Barcelona to new signing?
